16 BitBuffer::BitBuffer(size_t bitSize) : m_buffer((bitSize + 7) / 8), m_bitSize(bitSize)
17 {
18 }

20 BitBuffer::BitBuffer(const std::vector<uint8_t>& buffer) :
21  m_buffer(buffer), m_bitSize(8 * buffer.size())
22 {
23 }
24 
25 BitBuffer::BitBuffer(const std::vector<uint8_t>& buffer, size_t bitSize) :
26  m_bitSize(bitSize)
27 {
28  const size_t byteSize = (bitSize + 7) / 8;
29  if (buffer.size() < byteSize)
30  throw CppRuntimeException("BitBuffer: Bit size " + convertToString(bitSize) +
31  " out of range for given vector byte size " + convertToString(buffer.size()) + "!");
32 
33  m_buffer.assign(buffer.data(), buffer.data() + byteSize);
34 }
35 
36 BitBuffer::BitBuffer(std::vector<uint8_t>&& buffer) :
37  m_buffer(std::move(buffer)), m_bitSize(8 * m_buffer.size())
38 {
39 }
40 
41 BitBuffer::BitBuffer(std::vector<uint8_t>&& buffer, size_t bitSize) :
42  m_buffer(std::move(buffer)), m_bitSize(bitSize)
43 {
44  const size_t byteSize = (bitSize + 7) / 8;
45  if (m_buffer.size() < byteSize)
46  throw CppRuntimeException("BitBuffer: Bit size " + convertToString(bitSize) +
47  " out of range for given vector byte size " + convertToString(buffer.size()) + "!");
48 }
49 
50 BitBuffer::BitBuffer(const uint8_t* buffer, size_t bitSize) :
51  m_buffer(buffer, buffer + (bitSize + 7) / 8), m_bitSize(bitSize)
52 {
53 }
54 
55 bool BitBuffer::operator==(const BitBuffer& other) const
56 {
57  if (this != &other)
58  {
59  if (m_bitSize != other.m_bitSize)
60  return false;
61 
62  const size_t byteSize = getByteSize();
63  if (byteSize > 0)
64  {
65  if (byteSize > 1)
66  {
67  if (memcmp(getBuffer(), other.getBuffer(), byteSize - 1) != 0)
68  return false;
69  }
70 
71  if (getMaskedLastByte() != other.getMaskedLastByte())
72  return false;
73  }
74  }
75 
76  return true;
77 }
78 
79 int BitBuffer::hashCode() const
80 {
81  int result = ::zserio::HASH_SEED;
82  const size_t byteSize = getByteSize();
83  if (byteSize > 0)
84  {
85  if (byteSize > 1)
86  {
87  const uint8_t* lastElement = getBuffer() + byteSize - 1;
88  for (const uint8_t* p = getBuffer(); p < lastElement; p++)
89  result = calcHashCode(result, *p);
90  }
91  result = ::zserio::calcHashCode(result, getMaskedLastByte());
92  }
93 
94  return result;
95 }
96 
97 const uint8_t* BitBuffer::getBuffer() const
98 {
99  return m_buffer.data();
100 }

102 uint8_t* BitBuffer::getBuffer()
103 {
104  return m_buffer.data();
105 }
106 
107 size_t BitBuffer::getBitSize() const
108 {
109  return m_bitSize;
110 }
111 
112 size_t BitBuffer::getByteSize() const
113 {
114  return (m_bitSize + 7) / 8;
115 }
116 
117 uint8_t BitBuffer::getMaskedLastByte() const
118 {
119  const size_t roundedByteSize = m_bitSize / 8;
120  const uint8_t lastByteBits = static_cast<uint8_t>(m_bitSize - 8 * roundedByteSize);
121 
122  return (lastByteBits == 0) ? m_buffer[roundedByteSize - 1] :
123  (m_buffer[roundedByteSize] & (0xFF << (8 - lastByteBits)));
124 }
